metadata.description: Icons are a visual representation of an application, a capability, a concept or a specific entity with meaning on an interface (e.g., a floppy disk to represent a save action). Icons help users to recognize and understand a concept or an action regardless of linguistic or cultural boundaries. A list of available icons can be found in the [iconography foundation](/salt/foundations/iconography).

size.description: Multiplier for the base icon size. Should be a positive integer to conform to the rest of the design system.
